      • expireMessagesNow

        public void expireMessagesNow()
        Expires all messages with EXPIRE_AT < NOW 1. Gets all Messages with EXPIRE_AT < NOW 2. Delete attachments. If the message wasn't read & its not the users message: 3. Updates org unread count 4. Updates roster entry unread count 5. Updates roster last message id
